conversation_context.content: 1. 4 passengers  2. 100000 usd maximum 3. I want to be a very efficient car 4. I plan to use the car for both

Great, thank you for providing me with that information! Based on your preferences, here are some family cars that are highly efficient, spacious, and affordable:

1. Toyota Prius - This hybrid car is known for its excellent fuel efficiency and can seat up to 4 passengers. It has a maximum price range of around $30,000.

2. Honda Civic Hybrid - This car is also a hybrid model that offers great fuel efficiency and can seat up to 4 passengers. Its maximum price range is around $25,000.

3. Kia Niro - This crossover SUV is a great option for a family car as it offers a lot of space and is highly efficient. It can seat up to 4 passengers and has a maximum price range of around $25,000.

I hope this helps you find the perfect family car for your needs! Let me know if you have any other questions.
Where can I buy a Toyota Prius?

Great question! You can purchase a Toyota Prius from various dealerships across the United States. Here are some of the top dealerships that sell Toyota Prius:

1. Toyota Dealerships - You can find authorized Toyota dealerships in most major cities across the United States. They usually have a wide selection of Toyota Prius models and knowledgeable sales staff to help you find the right car for your needs.

2. CarGurus - CarGurus is an online car-buying platform that allows you to search for and compare prices of Toyota Prius models from various dealerships across the country. They also provide reviews and ratings from real car owners to help you make an informed decision.

3. Cars.com - Cars.com is another online car-buying platform that provides detailed information on Toyota Prius models, including prices, features, and reviews. You can also find dealerships in your area that sell Toyota Prius and compare prices.

I hope this helps you find the perfect Toyota Prius for your needs! Let me know if you have any other questions.
